memberdef.name: PSH_POINT_EDGE_MIN
memberdef.initializer: 512U /* point is aligned to left/bottom stem edge */

memberdef.name: PSH_POINT_EDGE_MAX
memberdef.initializer: 1024U /* point is aligned to top/right stem edge */

memberdef.argsstring: (PS_Hints ps_hints, FT_Outline *outline, PSH_Globals globals, FT_Render_Mode hint_mode)
memberdef.name: ps_hints_apply
